fr.escape.graphics

Class AnimationTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.escape.graphics.AnimationTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextureOperator

    public final class AnimationTexture
extends java.lang.Object
implements TextureOperator

    A composite of Texture for drawing a Animation (for example) or a Texture with state.

    See Also:
    Texture

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics,
        int x,
        int y,
        int width,
        int height,
        double angle)
        Description copied from interface: TextureOperator

        Draw a rectangle with the top left corner at x,y having the given width and height in pixels.

        The portion of the Texture is defined by the implementation of this interface.

        Specified by:
        draw in interface TextureOperator
        Parameters:
        graphics - Use this Graphics2D for drawing.
        x - Starting Position X in Display Screen.
        y - Starting Position Y in Display Screen.
        width - Ending Position X in Display Screen.
        height - Ending Position Y in Display Screen.
        angle - Rotation to apply on Texture in Degree (Optional)
